Welcome to Dave's Gaming Page!

About This Site

Hey everyone! This is my personal page where I share tips and tricks for the 10,000 Games Collection. I've been playing since release and found some awesome strategies!

My High Scores

  • Snake Classic - 24,580 points
  • Dodge Master - 187 seconds survived
  • Memory Match Plus - 38 second completion
  • Hidden Object Deluxe - 15 second find time

Recommended Games

After testing hundreds of variants, here are my top picks for token generation:

  • Snake Variant #0847 - Great parameters, easy to automate
  • Dodge Game #1523 - Tons of lives, low difficulty
  • Memory Match #0392 - Long memorization time

VM Automation Guide

Want to maximize passive income? Here's what I learned:

1. Find games with low RNG (random elements)

2. Practice until you have a safe, reliable strategy

3. Record your demo carefully - one mistake ruins the whole thing!

4. Start with 1x speed to verify it works

5. Gradually increase speed as you confirm success rate

6. Headless mode is amazing once you trust the demo!
